title: Signal Processing Block
description: This FUNCTION_BLOCK processes input signals and generates an output signal Q based on the input boolean parameters IN1, IN2, IN3, and IN4. It also utilizes a timestamp and local signal patterns for processing.
name: SIGNAL_4

input.name: IN1
input.description: Boolean input representing the first signal.

input.name: IN2
input.description: Boolean input representing the second signal.

input.name: IN3
input.description: Boolean input representing the third signal.

input.name: IN4
input.description: Boolean input representing the fourth signal.

input.name: TS
input.description: Timestamp indicating the time at which the signals are processed.

input.name: S1
input.description: Byte pattern for the first signal, initialized to 16#FF.

input.name: S2
input.description: Byte pattern for the second signal, initialized to 16#F0.

input.name: S3
input.description: Byte pattern for the third signal, initialized to 16#AA.

input.name: S4
input.description: Byte pattern for the fourth signal, initialized to 16#A0.

output.name: Q
output.description: Output boolean indicating whether an alarm condition is present.
